messages.content: My admission status is showing admission in process

next_reply.content:
Hello Lawal Awawu Morenikeji, JAMB Support here.

Thank you for contacting us regarding the status of your admission. We understand you're eager to hear back and that seeing "Admission in Process" can be nerve-wracking.

Rest assured, your application is being reviewed by the institution. Admission timelines vary between institutions and programs, so it's normal for this process to take some time.

We recommend you continue checking your JAMB CAPS portal regularly for any updates. Additionally, you can reach out directly to the admissions office of the institution you applied to for more specific information about their decision timeline.

We appreciate your patience as your application is being processed. 

Best regards,

Nonso Nwune
JAMB Support

messages.content:
Good day,

  Thanks for the opportunity to receive support from you, I am writing this to message purposely for issues related to my admission.

 Actually I was given admission about a month ago by the school I choose, they send a text message to inform me that I was given courses to choose from and that I should check my jamb cap. But when I checked my jamb admission status, here is what it's written "YOU ARE NOT ELLIGIBLE TO USE THIS SERVICE". so I don't know what to do please I need help.

next_reply.content:
Hello Arinze Victor Uzorchukwu, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us regarding your admission status. We understand your concern about the message you received on JAMB CAPS. 

The message "YOU ARE NOT ELLIGIBLE TO USE THIS SERVICE" on JAMB CAPS usually means one of the following:

* **Your profile hasn't been enabled for CAPS access yet:** This is common right after receiving admission. Your school needs to first upload your name on the JAMB CAPS portal.
* **There might be a technical issue on the JAMB portal:**  System glitches can occur occasionally.

**Here's what we recommend:**

1. **Contact your institution's admissions office:**  Inform them about the message you're seeing on JAMB CAPS. They can verify if your details have been uploaded and guide you further. 
2. **Try accessing JAMB CAPS again later:** Sometimes, it might be a temporary technical issue. Wait for a few hours or a day and try accessing it again.
3. **If the issue persists, contact JAMB directly:** They can provide further assistance and investigate any potential problems with your profile.

We hope this helps! Let us know if you have any other questions.

Best regards,

Nonso Nwune 
JAMB Support

next_reply.content:
Hello Chidiebere Joseph Anioke, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us regarding the error on your admission letter. We understand that it's crucial to have the correct qualification listed.

We are unable to make direct changes to admission letters issued by institutions. For corrections regarding the qualification listed on your admission letter, you'll need to contact the Institute of Management and Technology (IMT) directly. They have the authority to amend and reissue the document.

You can reach IMT through their admissions office or the relevant department. Please provide them with your JAMB registration number (44070076JD) and details about the error. 

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.

Best regards, 

JAMB Support

messages.content: 202330305468DF is my Jamb Registration Number, I applied FUTMinna and i was offered admission to study Biochemistry which I've accepted the Admission, reprinted the school admission showing my students ID, I was later asked to present my Jamb Admissions. I've Paid for it but it keeps saying. 'Candidate has not been given admission ''

next_reply.content:
Hello Muhammad Maryam, JAMB Support here,

We understand you're experiencing issues accessing your JAMB admission status on the FUTMinna portal despite accepting your admission offer. 

The message "Candidate has not been given admission" usually indicates that your admission on JAMB's Central Admissions Processing System (CAPS) might not be finalized.  

Please note: Accepting your admission on the school's portal (FUTMinna) and printing your admission letter doesn't automatically update your status on JAMB CAPS. You need to log in to your JAMB CAPS profile and accept your admission there as well.

**Here's what you can do:**

1. **Confirm Admission on JAMB CAPS:**
   - Visit the JAMB CAPS portal at [Provide the correct JAMB CAPS portal URL].
   - Log in using your JAMB registration number and password.
   - Navigate to the "Admission Status" section. 
   - If your admission is showing, accept it there. 

2. **Allow Time for Synchronization:** Sometimes, it takes a while for systems to synchronize. Allow 24-48 hours after accepting on CAPS, then try checking FUTMinna's portal again.

3. **Contact JAMB and FUTMinna:** 
   -  If the issue persists, we advise you to reach out to both JAMB and FUTMinna admissions offices directly for further assistance. 

We hope this helps! 

Best regards,
JAMB Support

messages.content: My name on my NIN, WAEC and JUPEB is Edoso Favour Moyinoluwa while my Jamb is carrying Edoso Favour Daniella due to that I haven't been given admission I changed the name on my NIN since but it hasn't reflected on my jamb portal which is depriving me of my admission letter now I want to appeal to jamb to please help me update my portal and change the third name from Daniella to Moyinoluwa as it is on my other documents and also grant me my admission letter as a direct entry student.

next_reply.content:
Hello Edoso Favour Daniella, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us regarding the issue with your JAMB profile name and admission status. We understand that this is a frustrating situation, and we're here to help guide you towards a resolution.

We acknowledge the discrepancy between the name on your JAMB profile (Edoso Favour Daniella) and your other official documents (Edoso Favour Moyinoluwa). It's important that all your details match to avoid complications with your admission process. 

Since you have already updated your NIN, you'll need to contact JAMB directly to initiate a name correction on your JAMB profile. They have a dedicated process for handling these types of corrections. 

You can reach JAMB through the following channels:

*   **JAMB Website:** Visit the official JAMB website and look for their contact information or support section.
*   **JAMB Offices:** You can visit any JAMB office closest to you for assistance.

**When contacting JAMB, please provide the following information:**

*   Your JAMB registration number.
*   A clear explanation of the name discrepancy.
*   Copies of your NIN slip, WAEC certificate, and JUPEB result showing your correct name. 

Once you've contacted JAMB and initiated the name correction process, allow them some time to update your details. After the correction is reflected on your JAMB profile, your institution should be able to process your admission. 

We hope this information helps! If you have any further questions, feel free to ask.

Sincerely,

JAMB Support

messages.content: I've not gotten admission letter yet and I'm hearing that jamb has reached it's limit for law in Ajayi Crowther university, I've uploaded my credentials since last year and I don't understand why I haven't been given, what can I do?

next_reply.content:
Hello Ajayi Adetoun Christianah, JAMB Support here.

We understand your concern about not receiving your admission letter to study Law at Ajayi Crowther University. We know this can be a stressful time. 

Please note that JAMB sets admission quotas and deadlines, which can vary between institutions and programs. Reaching the JAMB limit for Law at ACU means they may not be able to offer further admissions in that program this year, even if you meet the requirements. 

However, it's important to contact the Ajayi Crowther University Admissions Office directly. They are the best source of information about your specific application and can provide details about:

* **The status of your application:** They can tell you if it is still under review or if a decision has been made. 
* **Available options:** If you haven't been offered admission to Law, they can inform you of alternative programs you may be eligible for, or explain the process for applying again next year.

You can reach them using the contact information on their official website. 

We wish you the best with your application.

next_reply.content:
Hello Odeh Elizabeth Precious, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us regarding your admission letter. We understand you are unable to print it and need to upload it to your school portal. 

Please note that JAMB is responsible for releasing admission letters. If you have confirmed your admission status on the JAMB portal and the letter is not yet available for printing, it is possible there is a slight delay in the system. 

We kindly advise you to:

1. **Confirm your admission status:** Double-check on the official JAMB portal to ensure you have been offered admission.
2. **Check back later:** Allow some time for the system to update. Admission letters are usually available for printing within a few days of being offered admission. 

If the issue persists after a reasonable waiting period, please provide us with your JAMB registration number so we can look into this further for you.

Sincerely,

JAMB Support

messages.content: Good day  Pls a candidate with the registration number 202330425562GA has been given admission by ambrose University edo state  But on jamb portal another school named mudiame also gave him admission but we are trying to reject the one of mudiame but is not rejecting

next_reply.content:
Hello Isimenmen Peter Oseze, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us about the issue with rejecting the admission offer from Mudiame University on the JAMB portal.

We understand you are trying to accept Ambrose University's offer and decline Mudiame's.  It's important to ensure you only accept one admission offer on the JAMB portal to avoid complications. 

Since you are experiencing difficulties rejecting the offer from Mudiame, we recommend the following steps:

1. **Double-check the JAMB CAPS portal:** Ensure you are logged in with the correct JAMB registration number (202330425562GA) and are following the correct procedure to decline the admission offer. 
2. **Clear your browser cache and cookies:** Sometimes, browser issues can interfere with the functionality of the portal. Clearing your cache and cookies can resolve this.
3. **Try a different browser or device:** If the problem persists, attempt to access the portal using a different internet browser or device. 
4. **Contact JAMB directly:** If the issue remains unresolved, it's best to contact JAMB directly for further assistance. They can provide specific guidance and troubleshoot any technical issues on their end. You can reach them through their official helplines or visit a JAMB office near you.

We hope this information helps! 

Best regards, 

JAMB Support

next_reply.content:
Hello Moses Charity Nnenda, JAMB Support here, 

Thank you for contacting us and bringing this issue to our attention. We understand your concern about your admission status remaining as "Admission in Progress" on the JAMB CAPS portal. It appears this is related to the "Awaiting Result Verification" status on your NIDEP page.

To best assist you in resolving this, we kindly request you to take the following steps:

1. **Verify Your ND Result Upload:** Please confirm with your National Diploma awarding institution that your ND (National Diploma) result with examination number 97335433HG has been uploaded to the JAMB portal. This is crucial for NIDEP verification.

2. **Contact University of Port Harcourt:** While awaiting the result verification, we recommend reaching out to the admissions office at the University of Port Harcourt. They can provide further guidance and inform you of any additional requirements or timelines from their end. 

3. **CAPS Portal Monitoring:** Continue to monitor your JAMB CAPS portal regularly for any updates. 

We hope this information helps, and please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or require additional assistance.

next_reply.content:
Hello Faruku abdullahi, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us about the issue with your OND result upload. We understand your concern about this matter.

To best assist you, please confirm if your previous institution has provided you with any documentation or confirmation that your OND result has been sent to the JAMB headquarters in Abuja.  This confirmation is usually in the form of a letter or receipt.

Once you have obtained this confirmation, please forward a copy of it to us at this email address. This will allow us to investigate your case further with the relevant department.

We understand that this delay can be frustrating, and we want to assure you that we are committed to helping you resolve this issue.  We appreciate your patience and understanding. 

Sincerely, 

JAMB Support

messages.content: My Admission status is showing me admission being processed over some months ago I cannot accept admission
I cannot accept admission that was given to me
And my school have sent jamb a mail
Am waiting for jamb to respond, please I want jamb to respond to my problem that will enable me accept admission and start up the registration immediately

next_reply.content:
Hello Ahmad Sanusi Pada, JAMB Support here,

Thank you for contacting us about the issue with your admission status. We understand your frustration with the delay and your desire to accept your admission offer as soon as possible.

To best assist you, we need some additional information. Please provide us with your JAMB registration number. This will help us investigate the communication between JAMB and your school.

Once we have your JAMB registration number, we can look into the status of your admission and determine the next steps needed to resolve the issue.

We appreciate your patience and understanding.
